name: Danat Coin
description: Our Innovative website is the result of an exhaustive collaboration between a team of highly dedicated Bitcoin industry enthusiasts. We recognised that, whilst there were certainly many services for individual crypto currency pairs, none offered a consolidated solution that facilitated the exchange of all of the most popular cryptocurrencies within one single tool. A challenge that we felt was simply too good to refuse! HOW IT WORKS? IS THE WORLD'S MOST SOPHISTICATED CRYPTOCURRENCY DIGITAL WALLET TO FEATURE AN IN-BUILT INSTANT EXCHANGE! Registering in the Danat Coin system is exceptionally quick and easy. Simply supply your e-mail address and youâ€™ll automatically receive an email containing full instructions. Your online account enables you to create an individual wallet per cryptocurrency (out users can currently choose from 12 of the most popular), send and receive coins, perform instant exchanges and even earn commission by participating in our unique affiliate program!
